alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 4:47PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central St. Johns and east central Clay Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 447 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Picolata, or near Green Cove Springs, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine, World Golf Village, South Ponte Vedra, Vilano Beach, Picolata, Guana River State Park, Anastasia, Bakersville and South Ponte Vedra Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns
